ISSUE.TITLE: spreadsheet : edit column & right click options broken
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Root DB: MySQL Rebased @ https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/commit/7f0d12bd08dbaa330f7eda754858d529054768a1 ### 1: Edit column - Try changing name or configuring column as primary value - Delete column modal pops up ### 2: Right click options - Right click, try any of the operations on spreadsheet, new record is inserted ### 3: Toolbar, more actions - Toolbar, `More` options menu - any selection opens webhook Observation: it looks like due to [this line](https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/commit/65f0b1db1a6fb29b88f167a666acf410dcc1b547#diff-bc67077b3d22125eae8b5f7b646114da6af4c6398f0df0771fbc5a4607754cfcR78)

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: fix(gui-v2): ignore only mm and hm fields in fields re #3063 Signed-off-by: Pranav C <pranavxc@gmail.com>

COMMIT.MESSAGE: fix(gui-v2): add relative position to menu item element re #3053 Signed-off-by: Pranav C <pranavxc@gmail.com>
